attributes.action: Ensure Wirral air show 2016 uses biodegradable food and drink containers
attributes.background:
The New Brighteners are a volunteer beach cleaning group on the Wirral . We also campaign  to reduce the impact of plastic on our oceans !
Thi year in August the first Wirral air show will be held . We are asking that all food concessions are made to use biodegradable containers and forks

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue directly with the organisers of Wirral Air Show using the following website: http://www.wirralairshow.com/contact-us.php
